snippet: Hundreds of armed protesters on Sunday attacked the offices of Libya’s election commission in two cities, Benghazi and Tobruk.
abstract: Hundreds of armed protesters, angered over the way seats in the election for a constituent assembly were distributed among the country's regions, attack election commission offices in Eastern Libya.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

lead_paragraph: Hundreds of armed protesters on Sunday attacked the offices of Libya’s election commission in two cities, Benghazi and Tobruk.

headline.main: Election Commission Offices in Eastern Libya Are Sacked
headline.print_headline: Election Commission Offices in Eastern Libya Are Sacked
